fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- The King: Your role is Revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your True role, will show up as "King" as well. You start with 6 HP and your Hand Size is 6. You cannot participate in Duels. 
- Traitor: You have access to the Chaos chat. You will replace the Chaos Leader slot if you exist. You will appear to win with your Chaos teammates. **You have some different abilities than the Order King.**

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Play Block! on an attack directed at you of your choice. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Play a Heal! OR play a Cleanse! on yourself. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using more than 1 card next phase (including (Reforged) cards played upon them). [1 use, Unique]
- Retreat: Go to the King’s Quarters the following Night phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Facade: Disguise as the Order King this phase. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [3 uses]
- Inculcate: Choose a Chaos non-Unique ability and give __one__ use of it to a Chaos member that isn’t yourself. If the ability recharges, the given ability will not carry the modifier. [X uses, Graveyard, Astral]. *X = (# of Chaos members - 1)*
